directions: Combine zucchini slices, olive oil, garlic, basil, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Mix well, cover, and refrigerate for 6 hours.
Transfer everything including liquid to a large saucepan over high heat. Cover and cook until just tender, about 2 minutes. Remove with a slotted spoon.
ingredients: 4 large zucchini, halved and cut lengthwise into 1/8-inch thick slices
½ clove garlic, minced, or more to taste
title: Zucchini Ribbons
